channel.title: List of Free Domains and Redirects
channel.description:
[size=14pt][font=times new roman][b][u]List of Free Forums[/u][/b][/font][/size] Forumotion http://www.forumotion.com/
Makeaforum 10GB Of Storage http://www.makeforum.org/
Lefora 2GB Of Storage http://www.lefora.com/
Proboards http://www.proboards.com/
Freeforums(.org) http://www.freeforums.org/
Freeforum(.ca) "UNLIMITED STORAGES" http://www.freeforum.ca/
PhpBB http://www.phpbb.com/
Forum-Free 10GB Storage http://forum-free.net/
FreeBB http://www.freebb.com/
Forumer http://www.forumer.com/
SparkBB http://www.sparkbb.com/
Webs http://www.webs.com/ [font=Times New Roman][size=14pt][b][u]Domain Redirect's[/u][/b][/size][/font]
DotTK http://www.dot.tk/en/index.html?lang=en
ME http://www.domain.me/registerame/index.html
ShortURL http://www.shorturl.com/
domainRedirect http://www.domainredirect.com/
